job_history.work_description: Oversee and lead the Infrastructure & Operations IT Service, 24x7. This includes the supervision of four divisions: (1) Programming & Applications; (2) Networking & Communications; (3) Desktop Services & Support; and (4) Operating Systems & Database. Performance management and KPIs.
Provided technical leadership to a data center and technical supervision of analysts, programmers, database administrators, and network as well as the support personnel.
Delivered technical direction for a multimillion dollar Monitoring and Controlling System.
Assist in computer network & voice integrator in over 11 Medical Center locations. Consulted for individuals and organizations in information technology business solution.
Assist in computer network & voice integrator in over 11 Medical Center locations. Consulted for individuals and organizations in information technology business solution.
Taught courses in (1) Optical Networking; (2) System Analysis and Design.
Taught graduate courses in (1) Data Communication, Networks and Distributed Processing; (2) Computer Concepts and Programming Tools; (3) Relational Databases.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in leadership roles, including overseeing and leading large teams, supervising multiple divisions, and providing technical direction for multimillion-dollar projects, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Has successfully managed multiple large-scale projects, including a multimillion-dollar Monitoring and Controlling System, demonstrating expert-level proficiency in project management.

skills.name: IT Service Management
skills.explanation: Has experience in overseeing and leading IT service management, including supervision of multiple divisions, performance management, and KPIs, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Network Administration
skills.explanation: Has experience in network administration, including supervision of networking and communications divisions, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Database Administration
skills.explanation: Has experience in database administration, including supervision of database administrators, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Computer Systems
skills.explanation: Has experience in computer systems, including supervision of operating systems and desktop services, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Teaching
skills.explanation: Has experience in teaching graduate and undergraduate courses in various IT-related subjects, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Consulting
skills.explanation: Has experience in IT business consulting, assisting individuals and organizations in information technology business solutions, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Optical Networking
skills.explanation: Has experience in teaching optical networking courses, suggesting a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: System Analysis and Design
skills.explanation: Has experience in teaching system analysis and design courses, suggesting a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Data Communication
skills.explanation: Has experience in teaching data communication courses, suggesting a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Relational Databases
skills.explanation: Has experience in teaching relational databases courses, suggesting a solid working proficiency.
